content: *this washcloth/dishcloth is a great beginner project that can be used for years so much nicer and thicker than store-bought dishrags lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # ckc-dishcloths skill level beginner level 1 lion® cotton article #760 1 ball *one ball makes several dishcloths* crochet hook - size f-5 3 75 mm 4-row pattern creates a nubby surface knit version dish cloth knit #kkc-dishcloths 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/dish-cloth-knit-kkc-dishcloths
